Method Detail

getInstance

public static SimpleGeoStorageClient getInstance(java.lang.String baseUrl,
                                                 java.lang.String port,
                                                 java.lang.String apiVersion)
Method that ensures we only have one instance of the SimpleGeoStorageClient instantiated. Also allows server connection variables to be overridden.

Parameters:
baseUrl - String api.simplegeo.com is default, but can be overridden.
port - String 80 is default, but can be overridden.
apiVersion - String 1.0 is default, but can be overridden.
Returns:
SimpleGeoStorageClient

getInstance

getHistory

public GeometryCollection getHistory(java.lang.String layer,
                                     java.lang.String recordId,
                                     int limit,
                                     java.lang.String cursor)
                              throws java.io.IOException
Synchronously get the history of the record that corresponds to the recordId

Parameters:
layer - String name of the layer
recordId - String id of this record
limit - The maximum number of records to return. Default: 10
cursor - String encrypted string that is returned when a previous query has reached its prescribed limit and still has more records to return.
Returns:
GeometryCollection GeometryCollection representing the history of record with the specified recordId and layer
Throws:
java.io.IOException

search

public FeatureCollection search(double lat,
                                double lon,
                                java.lang.String layer,
                                double radius,
                                int limit,
                                java.lang.String cursor)
                         throws java.io.IOException
Synchronously search for nearby records in the specified layer.

Parameters:
lat - double latitude
lon - double longitude
layer - String name of the layer
radius - double A distance in kilometers used to restrict searches
limit - The maximum number of records to return. Default: 25
cursor - String encrypted string that is returned when a previous query has reached its prescribed limit and still has more records to return.
Returns:
FeatureCollection FeatureCollection containing search results.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

Parameters:
lat - Double latitude
lon - double longitude
layer - String name of the layer
radius - double A distance in kilometers used to restrict searches
limit - The maximum number of records to return. Default: 25
cursor - String encrypted string that is returned when a previous query has reached its prescribed limit and still has more records to return.
callback - SimpleGeoCallback Any object implementing the SimpleGeoCallback interface
Throws:
java.io.IOException

searchByIP

public FeatureCollection searchByIP(java.lang.String ip,
                                    java.lang.String layer,
                                    int limit,
                                    java.lang.String cursor)
                             throws java.io.IOException
Synchronously search for records near a given IP address for the specified layer.

Parameters:
ip - String IP address If blank, your IP address will be used
layer - String name of the layer
limit - The maximum number of records to return. Default: 25
cursor - String encrypted string that is returned when a previous query has reached its prescribed limit and still has more records to return.
Returns:
FeatureCollection FeatureCollection containing search results.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
